name: Variance (game-racers)
description:
VR Game made in College for a class with a team of 3 members. Lauren Rota, Jon Stephens and yours truly.  

Our story included a young adult, living on her own, discovering that she has some gained a strange and cursed power, the ability to change into other animals. In her society, shapeshifters are a danger onto society and have to be under strict control by the gov. 

Due to time constraints and intense courses that semester, we were only able to implement controls and some story that is visible in the journals scattered around. We were also able to get what we called, Mouse Mode available where you can become tiny and climb furniture as if you were a mouse.
